document_data.name: Yuan-ti
document_data.mainbody: The '''Yuan-ti language''' was the tongue spoken by the [[Yuan-ti]] races. Yuan-ti was also spoken as a second language by [[human]]s in [[Lapaliiya]] and the [[Tashalar]] and by [[ophidian]]s.

Derivations.Hlondethan creole: A distinct dialect of [[Sespechian]], spoken in the city-state of [[Hlondeth]], that combined elements of Proper Sespechian with the Yuan-ti tongue.{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}}
